projects.name: Example Project
projects.description: This is intended to describe the project; if it's a game, what is the game about? If it's a website, what is the website for? In this example, I'm just adding filler text.

projects.name: Monospace
projects.description: 2D platformer about a mouse trying to return home. Solo project created over the course of five months.

projects.name: Instalocked Inc.
projects.description: A simple web app in jest of a specific type of Valorant player. Originally created using vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, redone to use React.

projects.name: Webpage from Image Mockup
projects.description: Static webpage built to match an existing image mockup as close as possible.

projects.name: Arcfest
projects.description: Fast-paced one-versus-one brawler where you fight to knock someone out of a quick closing zone.
